name: entangle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause something to become caught in something such as a net or ropes: be entangled in/with The dolphin had become entangled in/with the fishing nets. entangled in/with something/someone
involved with something or someone in a way that makes it difficult to escape: He went to the shop to buy bread, and got entangled with a carnival parade.

Add to word list
to trap something within something else from which it is difficult to escape: A seal became entangled in the fishing net. fig. The movie explores the entangled (= mixed together in many ways) lives of the five characters.
